Package Boundary

Class UserUI

java.lang.Object
Boundary.UserUI
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminUI, MovieGoerUI
public abstract class UserUI extends Object
This Class is an abstract class which ensures that the AdminUI and MovieGoerUI subclasses implement the showSelections and showUI methods. The other concrete methods in this Class are inherited by both subclasses.

    int
    checkInput(String input)
    This method validates the String input of users and removes the problems of accepting integer input through the Scanner.

    abstract void
    showSelections()
    Displays the list of possible actions to the current user.
    abstract void
    showUI(Scanner sc)
    This method operates in sync with the showSelections method above to accept input from the current user.

  • Method Details

    • showSelections

      public abstract void showSelections()
      Displays the list of possible actions to the current user. Abstract method.

    • showUI

      public abstract void showUI(Scanner sc)
      This method operates in sync with the showSelections method above to accept input from the current user.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object to allow users to make their selections.

    • listMovies

      public void listMovies()
      Enables users to view the full list of Movies available.

    • printShowsId

      public void printShowsId()
      Helper function to print the shows and their associated showIDs to assist users in selecting the IDs of their chosen show.

    • checkInput

      public int checkInput(String input) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method validates the String input of users and removes the problems of accepting integer input through the Scanner.
      Parameters:
      input - String input by current user.
      Returns:
      the integer representation of the input if parsing is successful.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - UNCHECKED --> thrown when user input fails to be parsed as an integer.
